subject: Re: free shipping over $249 Fw: [Total Contacts] New customer order (36729) - August 4, 2025

full_threads.body:
Hi Lee,

Thanks!

Confirming we have updated the email. It should say "Shipping Address" instead of "Customer name and address"

Hi Joel,
If its quicker, we just need to specify Shipping Address, rather than "Customer name and address"

Lee:)

Hi Elise,

I hope you're doing well.
We're currently looking into this and just wanted to confirm a few details.

We found an order here: Order Link, and it appears the attached screenshot is being sent to cs@au.coopervision.com .

Would you like us to remove the billing address from the order details being sent to these suppliers?

Please note that there isn't a quick setting available to disable this, so implementing the change may take approximately 2–3 hours.

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Good morning,

Hope everyone is well 🙂

I was wondering if there's a way to have just the customer shipping name and address in the details being sent to the supplier? (but both addresses coming through to us)

We've had only a few orders where the billing and shipping details are different, but each one has been queried by the supplier (and each one has been directed to the shipping address).

Whether that be to make the shipping details the main one, with the billing details as secondary.

Thoughts?

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Thanks Joel,

At least I didnt muck it up:)

Hi Lee,

I hope you're having a great day!

We’ve been looking into the shipping setup, and free shipping is working perfectly (please see the attached screenshot). However, we noticed that the flat rate option is still showing alongside it.

To make things smoother for customers, we’ve added a little code snippet that hides the flat rate whenever free shipping is available. This should help streamline the checkout experience.

Let us know if there’s anything else you'd like us to check or adjust.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,
Could u check this out? I set up our new shipping charges: $6.95 flat rate all orders under $249, free shipping over $249. Elise flagged this one below. Could u check if i have set it up wrong?

Thanks
Lee

Elise
